COMPANY_METADATA_OGTITLE: ข้อมูลงานและบริษัทของ Discord
COMPANY_METADATA_DESCRIPTION: Apply for jobs at Discord HQ and build a sweet chat app that millions of gamers use to play with their friends. Check out company information including perks and location.
COMPANY_FOUNDED_HEADING: พวกเราคือใคร
COMPANY_FOUNDED_TEXT: เกมเมอร์, เด็กเนิร์ด, แม่คน, พ่อคน, วิศวกร, ดีไซเนอร์, และอื่นๆ Discord คือเหล่าเกมเมอร์กลุ่มเล็กๆที่มีความตั้งใจจะนำผู้คนมารวมกันรอบๆสิ่งที่เรียกว่าเกมส์ ความแตกต่างและการร่วมมือกันของผู้คนคือส่วนสำคัญที่จะพาเราไปยังจุดหมายที่วางไว้ พวกเราเชื่อว่าด้วยความร่วมมือกัน ของผู้คนที่แตกต่างกัน จะนำเราไปสู่แอปที่ดีขึ้น, การตัดสินใจที่ดีขึ้นและสภาพแวดล้อมการทำงานที่ดีกว่าเดิม พวกเราทุกคนที่นี่มีความพยายามอย่างยิ่งในการสร้างสรรค์ Discord ให้เป็นดั่งโลกที่พวกเราอยากจะอยู่และใช้เวลาเล่นเกมไปกับมัน
COMPANY_HERO_HEADING: เราสร้างสรรค์ Discord ขึ้นเพื่อรวบรวมเหล่าเกมเมอร์เข้ามาไว้ด้วยกัน
COMPANY_HERO_TEXT: ช่วงเวลาของความสัมพันธ์ที่ดีที่สุดในชีวิตของเราถูกสร้างขึ้นจากการเล่นเกม วันคืนที่เราอดหลับอดนอนเล่น Warcraft 3 ด้วยกัน หรือที่เราโชว์บ้านใน The Sims ให้เพื่อนดูนั้นเราไม่เคยลืม Discord มีการสื่อสารด้วยเสียงและแชทด้วยตัวอักษรซึ่งจะทำให้การใช้เวลากับเพื่อนนั้นง่ายขึ้นอย่างมาก สื่อสารกันเพื่อสร้างความทรงจำดีๆ หรือเพื่อรวมพลังกันเพื่อเก็บซัก 1 หรือ 2 คิลก็ยังดี
COMPANY_HIRING_BUTTON: ดูตำแหน่งงานที่ยังว่าง
COMPANY_HIRING_HEADING: มาพูดคุยกันในเมืองที่แสน "สดใส" San Francisco
COMPANY_HIRING_TEXT: มาร่วมเป็นส่วนหนึ่งของกลุ่มเกมเมอร์ที่มีความมุมานะและตั้งใจในการสร้างสรรค์ผลงาน ผลงานที่พวกเขามีความตั้งใจและมุมานะจะสร้างอย่างที่สุด ฮู้วว
COMPANY_INVESTORS_HEADING: เหล่านักลงทุนที่ฉลาดที่สุดในโลกส่วนหนึ่งเชื่อมั่นในเรา
COMPANY_INVESTORS_TEXT: เราได้ระดมทุนกว่า 1,000,000,000 บาท จากบริษัทเทคโนโลยียักษ์ใหญ่ในโลกเช่น Greylock, Benchmark และ Tencent หรือถ้าพูดอีกอย่างคือ เราคงอยู่ให้ทุกคนเห็นหน้าไปอีกพักใหญ่ทีเดียว
COMPANY_PRESS_HEADING: ลองอ่านข้อความนี่สิ...
COMPANY_PRESS_TEXT_1: "Honestly, Discord is just killing it from their tech to their people. Excited to see what comes next."
COMPANY_PRESS_TEXT_2: "Our close knit community wouldn't have been made possible without Discord - it was the perfect tool to bring our community to the next level."
COMPANY_PRESS_TEXT_3: "Discord is an increasingly big deal and it's worth your time to take a look if you're seeking more ways to connect with the communities around the games you play."
COMPANY_STATS_HEADING: ผู้คนจำนวนมากมายใช้ Discord
COMPANY_STATS_TEXT: และพวกเขาใช้มันทุกๆวัน
COMPANY_STATS_TEXT_1: ผู้ใช้ต่อวัน
COMPANY_STATS_TEXT_2: ผู้ใช้พร้อมกันสูงสุด
COMPANY_STATS_TEXT_3: ข้อความที่ถูกส่งในแต่ละวัน
COMPANY_TWEETS_HEADING: ผู้คน <3 เราจริงๆนะ
COMPANY_TWEETS_TEXT: ไม่ต้องไปหาคำยืนยันที่ไหนไกลกว่านี้อีกแล้ว [Twitter stream]({link})
COMPANY_TWEETS_TEXT_1: Discord ช่วยขับเคลื่อนองกรณ์ของเราไปข้างหน้า พบเพื่อนใหม่ๆ และสร้างสรรค์ประสบการณ์ที่ไม่มีวันลืม ถ้าไม่มี Discord เราคงไม่รู้จะทำอย่างไร
COMPANY_TWEETS_TEXT_2: Discord คือโปรแกรมพูดคุยด้วยเสียงที่เสถียรที่สุด การใช้งานที่ง่ายและดีไซต์ที่เราปรับแต่งได้เองทำให้ Discord เป็นแอปที่สุดยอดที่ใครๆจะหามาใช้งาน
COMPANY_TWEETS_TEXT_3: Discord มีความเสถียร, คุณภาพเสียง, ฟีเจอร์ที่ยอดเยี่ยม, ใช้งานง่าย, ปรับแต่งได้, ลื่นไหล, มี gaming overlay, แก้ไขบัคอย่างรวดเร็ว และอื่นๆอีกมากมาย

HYPESQUAD_METADATA_OGTITLE: เข้าร่วม Hypesquad กับ Discord - เป็นตัวแทนนำเสนอ Discord, รับรางวัลมากมาย
HYPESQUAD_METADATA_DESCRIPTION: เป็นตัวแทนนำเสนอ Discord ในงานอีเว้นท์ท้องถิ่น - ไม่ว่าจะไปเข้าร่วม หรือเป็นผู้จัด เราจะจัดเต็มคุณด้วยผลิตภัณฑ์จาก Discord เพื่อไปกระจายชื่อเสียง และทำให้ทุกคนสดใส!
HYPESQUAD_ABOUT_TITLE: Hypesquad นี่เกี่ยวกับอะไร?
HYPESQUAD_ABOUT_SUBTITLE_1: คุณตื่นเต้นกับ Discord, เราก็ตื่นเต้นที่คุณตื่นเต้นกับ Discord เหมือนกัน
HYPESQUAD_ABOUT_SUBTITLE_2: เราไปพาทุกๆคนมาตื่นเต้นไปกับ Discord ด้วยกันเถอะ
HYPESQUAD_APPLY_BUTTON_AGE_VERIFICATION: คุณต้องมีอายุ 16 ปีหรือมากกว่าเพื่อจะสมัคร

HYPESQUAD_CTA_TEXT: ผู้สร้างคอนเท้นท์? องกรณ์ Esports? ชุมชน?
HYPESQUAD_DUTY_1_TEXT: กรอกใบสมัครให้เราเห็นว่าคุณตื่นเต้นไปกับเราขนาดไหน
HYPESQUAD_DUTY_1_TITLE: ร่วมเป็น Hype
HYPESQUAD_DUTY_2_TEXT: รับรางวัลเจ๋งๆมากมาย ขึ้นอยู่กับระดับความตื่นเต้นของคุณ!

HYPESQUAD_HERO_COPY: Want to rep Discord? Join the HypeSquad and let Discord support your gaming community.
HYPESQUAD_HERO_APPS_CLOSED_COPY: We are currently working on going through all of your hype applications and making a few small changes to the program. Get excited! Applications will be back soon.
HYPESQUAD_PERKS_SUBTITLE: Check out all the bologna you'll get if you are approved:
HYPESQUAD_PERK_1_TEXT: Get an exclusive HypeSquad badge for your profile and make all your friends jelly.
HYPESQUAD_PERK_2_TEXT: Event-related members gain access to the super secret HypeSquad Events Server.
HYPESQUAD_PERK_3_TEXT: Helping us at an event? You'll receive a HypeSquad t-shirt for your torso parts.
HYPESQUAD_PERK_4_TEXT: Running events of your own? We'll supply you with a big ol' box of goodies.
GUIDELINES_METADATA_OGTITLE: What's awesome and not awesome to do on Discord
GUIDELINES_METADATA_DESCRIPTION: These community guidelines are developed to make sure everyone on Discord has a good time making great memories playing games.
GUIDELINES_CHECKOUT_THIS_GUILD: Check out this guide on how to submit a report through the Discord app.
GUIDELINES_HELP_TWITTER_BLURB: Follow us or tweet at us for quick questions.
GUIDELINES_HELP_HELP_CENTER_BLURB: All you need to know in one place.
GUIDELINES_GUIDE_BLURB: Help us keep Discord safe by reporting unsafe content
GUIDELINES_GUIDE_DESCRIPTION_STEP_1: Right click a message or click on the message options to the right hand side of the message. Select the Report option.
GUIDELINES_GUIDE_DESCRIPTION_STEP_2: A few options will pop up. Tell us what you're reporting by selecting the most applicable option.
GUIDELINES_GUIDE_DESCRIPTION_STEP_3: Once you submit your report, our trust and safety team will review the case and take appropriate action.
JOB_DIVERSITY_STATEMENT: Discord is a small group of passionate gamers whose mission is to bring people together around games. Diversity and inclusiveness are a critical part of how we get there. We believe that with diversity comes a better product, better decisions, and a better work environment. Everyone here is committed to making Discord representative of the world we want to live and play in.
JOB_FORM_EEOC_STATEMENT: Discord is dedicated to creating and sustaining a diverse workplace. To achieve this, we have some questions which will help us see how well we are doing, and find out where we can do better. The questions are voluntary and your answers are anonymous.  They will not be attached to your application or visible by anyone in the interview process. Participating or not participating in this survey will not impact the outcome of your application.
JOB_SUBMITTED_SUBTITLE: Thanks so much for applying. We’ll check out your application and get back to you shortly.
JOBS_METADATA_DESCRIPTION: Apply for jobs at Discord HQ and build a sweet chat app that millions of gamers use to play with their friends. Check out company information including perks and location.
JOBS_CTA_TEXT_1: [Discord's culture is something we care deeply about]({link}). We take time to make sure we’re building a rewarding, challenging, and positive company where people can thrive doing their best work.
JOBS_CTA_TEXT_2: So, want to work in a beautiful office in an awesome city with great people building something that impacts millions of gamers?
JOBS_ERROR_404: We couldn't find the job you requested, but we have plenty more on our [Jobs page]({link})!
JOBS_ERROR_API_FALL_DOWN_GO_BOOM: Our job operational unit seems to be down. We're fixing it, please check back soon.
JOBS_HERO_TEXT_1: Discord is home to a diverse group of engineers, marketers, designers, support peeps, gamers, and geeks.
JOBS_JOBS_TEXT: We're changing the way people discover and play games together. We'd love your help.
JOBS_PERKS_TEXT_1: Keep those hearts full with Medical (HMO or PPO), Dental, and Vision insurance. Stay swole with our Gym/Activity benefit as well.
JOBS_PERKS_TEXT_2: We provide Basic Life & AD&D, Disability, Supplemental Life, and Accident insurance. Free employee assistance program as well.
JOBS_PERKS_TEXT_3: Stay refreshed with 15 days of PTO, 14 paid holidays, 3 sick days, and your birthday off each year.
JOBS_PERKS_TEXT_4: Pre-tax commuter benefits and company sponsored commuter reimbursement program. Get over here!
JOBS_PERKS_TEXT_5: Get daily lunch from SF's best restaurants along with the snackiest snacks, coffee, and tea.
JOBS_PERKS_TEXT_6: It's never too early to start saving! Plan your future with our company 401(k).
JOBS_PERKS_TEXT_7: Get some gg's in with our monthly Game Night, twelve seat LAN, and arcade cabinets.
JOBS_PERKS_TEXT_8: We outfit you with the latest build and monitors of choice. Use your desk fund to add a touch of personality to your workspace. Also Discord swag.
JOBS_PERKS_TEXT_9: Our office is located in Potrero Hill, a little neighborhood in SF near awesome coffee, food, and Whole Foods. Also sushi.
JOBS_SQUAD_TEXT: We're a passionate group of gamers crafting exceptional products for all gamers.
LANDING_METADATA_TITLE: Free Voice and Text Chat for Gamers
LANDING_METADATA_OGTITLE: Discord - Free Voice and Text Chat
LANDING_METADATA_DESCRIPTION: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more.
LANDING_BLURB:
All-in-one voice and text chat for gamers that's free, secure, and works on both your desktop and phone.
          Stop paying for TeamSpeak servers and hassling with Skype. Simplify your life.

PARTNERS_METADATA_OGTITLE: Become a Discord Partner - Exclusive Perks and Rewards
PARTNERS_METADATA_DESCRIPTION: Become a Discord Partner and brand your Discord server with a custom link and invite splash image. Oh yeah, there's a sweet Discord Partner hoodie too.
PARTNERS_FAQ_QUESTION_1: What do we look for in partners?
PARTNERS_FAQ_ANSWER_1_PART_1: Someone who appreciates me for who I am and likes long walks on the beaches and candle-lit dinners and... wait, I think I misread the question.
PARTNERS_FAQ_ANSWER_1_PART_2: Really, we look for growing communities and content creators that show an authentic enthusiasm for Discord (which means you're already using Discord for your community). We want to support communities that support us. Acceptance into the program is extremely qualitative and will vary from one candidate to the next.
PARTNERS_FAQ_QUESTION_2: What numbers do I have to hit as a content creator/community to be accepted into the partnership program?
PARTNERS_FAQ_ANSWER_2_PART_1: For Twitch broadcasters, we look for streamers that have around 10,000 followers and at least 100 concurrent viewers. You must be streaming at least 4 times per week.
PARTNERS_FAQ_ANSWER_2_PART_2: For Mixer broadcasters, we look for streamers that have around 10,000 followers and at least 50 concurrent viewers. You must be streaming at least 4 times per week.
PARTNERS_FAQ_ANSWER_2_PART_3: For YouTube, we look for channels with at least 100,000 subscribers and 10,000 average views per video. You must also upload 2-3 videos per week.
PARTNERS_FAQ_ANSWER_2_PART_4: For Reddit communities, we take a look at subreddits that have 8,000+ subscribers.
PARTNERS_FAQ_ANSWER_2_PART_5: If you represent a non-profit, we want to work with you too! Submit an application along with the EIN that matches your organization and you’ll hear from us soon.
PARTNERS_FAQ_ANSWER_2_PART_6: Remember that if you're currently not actively engaging your community on Discord, you will not be accepted into the partner program. Partnership on any platform does not guarantee partnership with Discord.
PARTNERS_FAQ_QUESTION_3: How long does it take to get my super rad Cloth Tunic of Partnership aka my Discord Partner hoodie?
PARTNERS_FAQ_ANSWER_3: It'll take approximately 1 to 3 weeks to receive your hoodie depending on how fast our delivery cheetahs can run and your location once you fill out the hoodie form in your acceptance email.
PARTNERS_FAQ_QUESTION_4: Am I able to get multiple servers VIP'd or multiple hoodies for my community?
PARTNERS_FAQ_ANSWER_4: No, because this is a slippery slippery slope and we've already fractured a wrist and had to get scaphoid surgery and we can't do that again.
PARTNERS_FAQ_QUESTION_5: When will my VIP server be activated?
PARTNERS_FAQ_ANSWER_5: The partner elves must complete their acceptance chant before your VIP server will be activated. This takes about one week after you receive your acceptance email.

RICHPRESENCE_HERO_HEADING: Make your game stand out with Rich Presence
RICHPRESENCE_HERO_TEXT: Engage our {num}+ million users by integrating your game with Discord. Rich Presence makes it easy for players to jump directly into your client and share your game.
RICHPRESENCE_FEATURE_TITLE_1: Get Viral Exposure For Your Game
RICHPRESENCE_FEATURE_TITLE_3: Launch Your Game In A Party
RICHPRESENCE_FEATURE_TEXT_1: Players love to show off what they are playing with Discord’s status feature. With Rich Presence you can add beautiful art and detailed information to show off your game even more. This lets players know what their friends are doing, so they can decide to ask to join in and play together.
RICHPRESENCE_FEATURE_TEXT_2: Every day millions of gamers start their session on Discord and then jump into a game. By hooking up the Join API, players can send party invites directly in Discord which will launch your game client. No more fussing around with friend codes and adding each other on other services.
RICHPRESENCE_FEATURE_TEXT_3: Similar to party invites above, increase engagement by letting players request an invite right within Discord. After a confirmation, both players will be partied up and ready to play.
RICHPRESENCE_FEATURE_TEXT_4: Have a spectate mode in your game? You can now add a Spectate button to a player’s profile so any of their friends can watch via your client in just one click. Players can also send a spectate invite to any chat channel they’d like.
RICHPRESENCE_INTEGRATION_TEXT: It only takes a few days of work using our open source Rich Presence SDK for C, C++, Unity, or Unreal to have all these Rich Presence features for your game.
RICHPRESENCE_CTA_TEXT: Rich Presence is available right now to integrate.

OPENSOURCE_OUR_PROJECTS_HEADING: Discord is committed to the principles of open source development: that we all succeed when we work together as engineers and share our solutions. Here are some of our open source contributions.
OPENSOURCE_LILLIPUT_DESCRIPTION: Lilliput resizes images in Go. It supports resizing JPEG, PNG, WEBP and animated GIFs.
OPENSOURCE_MANIFOLD_DESCRIPTION: Manifold distributes the work of sending messages to the remote nodes of the PIDs.
OPENSOURCE_FAST_GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION: This module is an Elixir version with some optimizations such as generating the atom keys and reusing them.
OPENSOURCE_ERLPACK_DESCRIPTION: Erlpack is a fast encoder and decoder for the Erlang Term Format (version 131) for Python and JavaScript.
OPENSOURCE_DEQUE_DESCRIPTION: An Erlang implementation of a deque using two rotating lists to support fast append and prepend.
OPENSOURCE_LOQUI_DESCRIPTION: Loqui is an RPC transport layer that implements a very simple framing protocol over a raw socket.
OPENSOURCE_SEMAPHORE_DESCRIPTION: A fast, low-contention semaphore on ETS.
OPENSOURCE_EX_HASH_RING_DESCRIPTION: A pure Elixir consistent hash ring implemention based on the excellent C hash-ring lib by Chris Moos.
OPENSOURCE_PUNT_DESCRIPTION: Punt is a lightweight and simple daemon that parses, transforms, mutates, and ships logs into Elasticsearch.
OPENSOURCE_SIMPLEAST_DESCRIPTION: SimpleAST is an extensible Android library for parsing and rendering rich text.

LEGAL_COMMUNITY_GUIDELINES:
We love playing games with our friends. That is and will continue to be Discord's driving motivation. The relationships, memories, and laughs we experience from gaming are what drive us to create a remarkable product that millions of people use - from small groups of ten friends to extremely large servers where thousands of people can connect.

  In order to further this philosophy, we've developed the community guidelines below.

  Note - we do not actively monitor and aren’t responsible for any activity or content that is posted; however, we expect server owners, mods, and admins to uphold their servers to these guidelines and we may intervene if community guidelines are not upheld.

  With that said, on to the community guidelines.

  ### The following is awesome:

  * Playing games with your friends.
  * Hanging out in communities of peoples.
  * Making connections and having fun.


  ### The following is not tolerated. We will remove content and issue a warning. Subsequent misconduct and cases of extreme severity will result in account deletion:

  * Organizing and participating in raids or other forms of harassment. Do not engage in or post content encouraging the harassment of individuals or communities. If someone is harassing you or your community, be proactive and block them immediately.
  * Circumventing tools that enable users to protect themselves and/or repeatedly targeting a user with unwanted friend requests or messages. Do not create spam accounts for the sake of annoying users with requests or other tactics. Do not disguise yourself in attempt to contact someone who has blocked you. Show respect to other people's desire for space.
  * Sharing illustrated or digitally altered pornography which depicts minors (such as lolicon or shotacon).
  * Sharing content that violates another person's contractual, personal, intellectual property or other rights. Do not share or post links that violate the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA). We respond to DMCA requests as described in our Terms of Service.
  * Sharing content glorifying or promoting, in general, self-harm or suicide. This includes any content that encourages others to: cut or injure themselves; embrace anorexia, bulimia, or other eating disorders; or commit suicide rather than, for example, seeking counseling or treatment. Online communities have the power to lift people up from dark places - be the kind of person who lifts others. If you notice that someone is in need of urgent help, please contact your local authorities.
  * Spamming of the support or trust & safety team. Do not use these channels to make false reports or spam multiple reports to Discord. We are committed to addressing each item as it comes in as quickly as we can.
  * Not properly labeling NSFW channels. Some content just isn't appropriate for kids under 18, so let's do the right thing in our community and [label any channel containing adult content as NSFW](https://support.discordapp.com/hc/en-us/articles/115000084051). This will add an age gate to the channel, protecting those who wish not to see.
  * Sharing images of gore and/or animal cruelty. Do not share or post graphic images for sadistic pleasure, glorification or celebration of violence.


  ### The following is completely unacceptable and will result in immediate content removal and account deletion:

  * Sharing content that is directly threatening someone's physical or financial state. Do not threaten to harm another person or someone related to another person in any capacity. Do not tell other people you will hurt or kill them. Do not dox people. Do not share or threaten to share personal information of another user - this includes but is not limited to home address, phone number, email, social security number, and photos. Respect other people's desire for privacy.
  * Doing anything illegal on Discord. This is directly from our [Terms of Service](/terms). We will take immediate action if you: violate any applicable laws or regulations, or promote or encourage any illegal activity including, but not limited to, hacking, cracking or distribution of pirated software, or cheats or hacks for our or another company or person's Service.
  * Sharing content related to minors that is sexually suggestive or violent. Do not share or post links to images that depict minors or underage individuals engaged in violent, sexually suggestive, pornographic, shameful, or otherwise inappropriate situations.
  * Sharing or linking to content with intent to shame or degrade another individual. Do not share sexually explicit content of other people without their consent. Do not share or promote sharing of revenge porn.
  * Distributing viruses. Do not engage in or promote phishing activities. Do not threaten another user with digital harm including but not limited to viruses, hacking, and spying.
  * Attempting to steal another user’s account.


  To report any of the above activity, please send an email to <abuse@discordapp.com>.

  Sidenote, if you’re looking to level up your security on Discord, [learn how here](https://support.discordapp.com/hc/en-us/articles/115000089272). You can also [level up your server's security](https://support.discordapp.com/hc/en-us/articles/115000088971).
LEGAL_TERMS_OCTOBER_2018_SUMMARY:
In support of the Discord game store launch, we’re updating our Terms of Service. For the [full binding legal agreement, click here](https://discordapp.com/terms).

  # What changed?

  We’ve added a couple sections to better support purchases on our game store as well as protect us against legal abuse:

  - We’ve clarified what it means when you buy and own virtual currency and virtual goods.
  - We also added a section about when games may be available and how sales may work.
  - We clarified how we collect payment from you and what our new refund policy is.
  - **For users in the United States**, we added an arbitration and class action waiver clause.
  - We’ve given you the right to opt out of arbitration by emailing us.


  # When will these changes take place?

  These changes take effect on **November 2nd 2018**. By using Discord on or after that date, you'll be agreeing to the changes.

  # Why did you add the arbitration clause?

  Because we are now operating a store, we can be a target for lawyers who wish to abuse class action lawsuits for their own profit. If you want to learn more, [read our blog post here](https://blog.discordapp.com/terms-of-service-feedback-and-changes-c58a530c7693).

  # How do I opt out of arbitration?

  As stated in our [Terms of Service](https://discordapp.com/terms), “you have the right to opt out and not be bound by the provisions requiring arbitration by sending written notice of your decision to opt out to Discord by email to [arbitration-opt-out@discord.com](mailto:arbitration-opt-out@discord.com).”

  Your opt out doesn’t need any specific template or form. It just needs the request to opt out and it must come from the email associated with your Discord account.

  # Will I be penalized for opting out?

  **You will not be penalized in any way if you opt out of arbitration**. At no point will we ever gate any features or take any action on any user because they’ve opted out of arbitration.

  # What if I want to know more?

  [Check out the full Terms of Service here](https://discordapp.com/terms). If you have any further questions, please send an email to [privacy@discordapp.com](mailto:privacy@discordapp.com) and we’ll be happy to answer!
TERMSOCTOBER2018SUMMARY_METADATA_DESCRIP: Summary of the October 2018 changes to Discord's Terms of Service.
